text: The Seals of Aal'drash are a set of massive [[dimensional seal]]s located near the center of [[Balinor's Sorrow]] in the [[Shadow Marches]]. The mysterious inscriptions on the seals may have been written by the legendary [[dragon]] [[Vvaraak]] herself, thousands of years before the [[daelkyr]] emerged and were bound by the [[Gatekeepers]].
title: Seals of Aal'drash
